title: Drawing, "Sunset, Hudson Valley, New York", 1870–80
medium: Brush and oil paint, graphite traces on paperboard
description: A thin strip of land with the Hudson River winding in the center middle distance; hills visible in right distance.  Dark clouds fill the sky except for a thin orange band of light in the left and center distance and patch of blue in upper right corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sunset, Hudson Valley, New York", 1870–80.
1870–80. Brush and oil paint, graphite traces on paperboard. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-497.
